pr_title: Form recognizer API's to return List over IterableStream

timeline.bodyText: Why is service version getting removed in this PR
timeline.author: iscai-msft

replies.bodyText:
It happens to TA as well. "Unless there is a use case, for now lets leave these getServiceVersion calls out."
https://apiview.dev/Assemblies/Review/05d0102010704cfa977f9386ce622294/067d8625611f4b329856ba69b7774d8d
replies.author: mssfang

timeline.bodyText:
Unclear how Java usually does these docstrings, but I notice in the docstring for the SyncPoller / PollerFlux you don't mention what the poller returns. Python includes this information in the docstring (ex here).
This comment isn't super related to what this PR is trying to do, so feel free to open another PR when / if you want to make this change
timeline.author: iscai-msft

timeline.bodyText: Would it also be best to change the forEach for formPage, formTable, formTableCell etc into a for loop as well?
timeline.author: iscai-msft

replies.bodyText: Updated formPage, formTable to loop over an indexed loop but for others the index isn't used in the sample so left as is.
replies.author: samvaity

timeline.bodyText: since you're changing the name of layoutPageResults -> contentPageResults, I think it's a good idea to change recognizeLayoutPoller -> recognizeContentPoller
timeline.author: iscai-msft

timeline.bodyText: {@link } could be a better option. Usually, use {@code } for the variable name.
timeline.author: mssfang
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -115,14 +113,13 @@ private Transforms() {
      * @param analyzeResult The service returned result for analyze receipts.
      * @param includeTextDetails Boolean to indicate if to set reference elements data on fields.
      *
-     * @return The IterableStream of {@code RecognizedReceipt}.
+     * @return The List of {@code RecognizedReceipt}.

timeline.bodyText: Don't think you made this change in the sync sample
timeline.author: iscai-msft

timeline.bodyText: use @link since FormPage is the first occurance in this javadoc section
timeline.author: mssfang
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -230,13 +220,13 @@ public FormRecognizerServiceVersion getServiceVersion() {
      * 5 seconds is used.
      *
      * @return A {@link PollerFlux} that polls the extract receipt operation until it has completed, has failed, or has
-     * been cancelled.
+     * been cancelled. The completed operation returns a List of {@code FormPage}.

timeline.bodyText: I think having @link for the first occurrence in method scope is better.
timeline.author: mssfang
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -266,10 +265,10 @@
      * 5 seconds is used.
      *
      * @return A {@link SyncPoller} to poll the progress of the extract receipt operation until it has completed,
-     * has failed, or has been cancelled.
+     * has failed, or has been cancelled. The completed operation returns a List of {@code RecognizedReceipt}.

timeline.author: mssfang
